name: ChatGPTx
description: PopClip extension for revising, polishing, and translating texts, powered by ChatGPT. The output will be pasted/appended or previewed.

options.label: API Base
options.description: The API base URL, azure ref: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#chat-completions.

options.label: Model
options.description: The model, such as gpt-35-turbo or something else.

options.label: Polish
options.description: Polish correct the grammar and polish the text.

options.label: Translate
options.description: Translate translates the text into Chinese by default.

options.label: Custom Prompts
options.description:
Customize prompts for revising, polishing, or translating texts. Separate each action on a separate line, for example: [revise] Revise the text.
[polish] Polish the text.
